title: Russia, Ukraine trade blame for dozens of deaths in Donetsk prison destruction
content:
1. Russia, Ukraine trade blame for dozens of deaths in Donetsk prison destruction  Reuters.com
  2. Russia claims 40 Ukrainian POWs killed in strike with US HIMARS, Ukraine decries 'brutal execution'  Fox News
  3. "Azov" announces a hunt for everyone involved in mass murder of prisoners in Olenivka  Yahoo News
  4. Russia and Ukraine accuse each other of attacking prison housing POWs  CNN
  5. Ukraine, Russia trade blame for strike reportedly killing dozens of prisoners of war  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
